content.question: A sign of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> hangs from the right end of a horizontal rod, also of mass <math alttext="m" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>m</mi></math> that is pivoted about an axis at its left end. A vertical rope is connected to the right end of the rod, as shown in Figure <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, and the rope exerts a torque of magnitude <math alttext="tau sub r 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> on the rod to keep the rod and sign in equilibrium. In Figure <math alttext="2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the rope and the sign are moved to the midpoint of the rod and the system is again in equilibrium. The magnitude of the torque exerted by the rope is <math alttext="tau sub r 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>. Which of the following correctly relates <math alttext="tau sub r 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="tau sub r 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="tau sub r 2 equals the fraction tau sub r 1 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub r 2 equals tau sub r 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub r 2 equals the fraction 2 tau sub r 1 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="tau sub r 2 equals 2 tau sub r 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="tau sub r 2 equals the fraction 2 tau sub r 1 over 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><msub><mi>τ</mi><mrow><mi>r</mi><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mn>3</mn></mfrac></mstyle></math>
